tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteRecyclingProcesses (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_used VARCHAR(255),
    recycle_percentage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementProcesses (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteRecyclingProcesses (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  process_description TEXT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WasteMaterials (
  material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  recycling_code VARCHAR(10),
  recycling_percentage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementOperations (
  operation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  operation_type VARCHAR(50),
  operation_date TIMESTAMP,
  operation_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_statistics (
  stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  operation_id INT,
  stats_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES waste_recycling_process(process_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials_used(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (operation_id) REFERENCES waste_management_operations(operation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingTransactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  material_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  recycling_center_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (recycling_center_id) REFERENCES RecyclingCenter(id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposal (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_date DATE,
  waste_category_id INT,
  disposal_location VARCHAR,
  amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (waste_category_id) REFERENCES WasteCategory(id)
);
